fields.Description/Abstract: What are the next steps for makerspaces? How can we better design spaces to help our users and empower them to acquire new skills? Hear about different makerspace models of engagement, critical partnerships, and how to develop a maker-type space in your own library. Makerspaces are communities as well as spaces and places. How can we use informal learning techniques, team-based learning, and constructivism to establish powerful makerspaces in our libraries and engage our communities?
